messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Emil. May I know your name, please?
Hi Emil, my name is Fiona.
Nice to meet you, Fiona. How can I assist you today?
I recently bought a pack of Nespresso Coffee Capsules, but some of them were damaged when I opened the box.
I'm sorry to hear that, Fiona. Can you please describe the damage to the capsules?
Sure, a few of the capsules were crushed, and one of them had a small puncture.
Thank you for providing those details. I'll need to gather a bit more information to assist you further. Can you please provide the batch number and the date of purchase?
The batch number is 2078N, and I bought them last Saturday.
Got it, Fiona. We apologize for the inconvenience. I will arrange for a replacement pack to be sent to you. Can I confirm your delivery address?
Thank you, Fiona. We will send out a replacement pack to 123 Maple Street, Springfield right away. You should receive it within 3-5 business days. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, that's all. Thank you so much for your help, Emil.
You're welcome, Fiona. Have a great day!
